entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and classmate, who is envious of Harry's new broomstick.

entities.name: oliver wood
entities.description: The Quidditch captain at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who will meet Harry for his first training session.

entities.name: professor m. mcgonagall
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who wrote the note to Harry.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: One of Draco Malfoy's friends, who blocks Harry's path with Goyle.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: One of Draco Malfoy's friends, who blocks Harry's path with Crabbe.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, who is jealous of Harry's new broomstick.

relationships.description: Oliver Wood will meet Harry for his first Quidditch training session.
Professor McGonagall wrote the note to Harry with information about his new broomstick.
Ron is envious of Harry's new broomstick.
Draco Malfoy is jealous of Harry's new broomstick.
Crabbe blocks the path with Goyle, preventing Harry from going upstairs.
